reporting.reportvalue.ValueQuery: /* Returns the number of orders from @FromDate to @ToDate */ SELECT CAST(ISNULL(COUNT(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),0) AS DECIMAL(38,0)) FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (dateadd(hour,datediff(hour,0,@FromDate),0) <= OrderDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (dateadd(hour,datediff(hour,0,dateadd(hour,1,@ToDate)),0) > OrderDate OR @ToDate IS NULL)
